caseTitle: Sarhad Development Authority through its Chairman, Peshawar and another v. Syed Muhammad Latif Shah and others
tagline: The Government was required to frame rules pertaining to terms and conditions of services of the officers and employees of Sarhad Development Authority (“the Authority”). Such omission, prima facie, shows that the Government, in absence of the proposed rules, is regulating the service of the Authority by exercising its unstructured discretion in recruitment/promotion of officers and employees in the Authority.
